data.quote: What really knocks me out is a book that, when you're all done reading it, you wish the author that wrote it was a terrific friend of yours and you could call him up on the phone whenever you felt like it. That doesn't happen much, though.
data.author: J.D. Salinger

data.quote: A writer is someone for whom writing is more difficult than it is for other people.
data.author: Thomas Mann

data.quote: A good novel tells us the truth about its hero; but a bad novel tells us the truth about its author.
data.author: Anonymous

data.quote: Failure is a bruise, not a tattoo.
data.author: Jon Sinclair

data.quote: If you have a dream, don’t just sit there. Gather courage to believe that you can succeed and leave no stone unturned to make it a reality.
data.author: Dr Roopleen

data.quote: No matter what anybody tells you, words and ideas can change the world.
data.author: John Keating

data.quote: A river cuts through a rock not because of its power but its persistence.
data.author: Anonymous

data.quote: Worrying is stupid. It's like walking around with an umbrella waiting for it to rain.
data.author: Wiz Khalifa

data.quote: I can and I will. Watch me.
data.author: Anonymous

data.quote: It's a slow process, but quitting won't speed it up.
data.author: Anonymous

data.quote: Quiet people have the loudest minds.
data.author: Stephen King

data.quote: The expert in anything was once a beginner.
data.author: Anonymous

data.quote: Wake up. Kick ass. Repeat.
data.author: Anonymous

data.quote: A smooth sea never made a skilled sailor.
data.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

data.quote: A story is a letter that the author writes to himself, to tell himself things that he would be unable to discover otherwise.
data.author: Anonymous

data.quote: Look in the mirror... That's your competition.
data.author: Anonymous

data.quote: Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.
data.author: Karim Seddiki

data.quote: If you have any young friends who aspire to become writers, the second greatest favor you can do them is to present them with copies of The Elements of Style. The first greatest, of course, is to shoot them now, while they’re happy.
data.author: Dorothy Parker

data.quote: You may also be twelve.
data.author: John Scalzi

data.quote: Sometimes those opinions will be ones you don’t like.
data.author: Anonymous
